function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerability of low-and middle-income countries due to epidemiological factors, transmission challenges, and high demand for the health system.","Impact":"Higher risk of COVID-19 spread and greater burden on health systems in LMICs.","Mitigation":"Improving hygiene infrastructure, implementing control measures, and providing access to necessary resources.","Technologies":"Sanitation technology, data analysis tools for monitoring, waste disposal systems.","People":"Residents of low-and middle-income countries.","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations."},{"Description":"Contaminated wastewater as a source of disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission to human beings and animals.","Mitigation":"Wastewater surveillance and pathogen tracking, proper management of water sanitation and hygiene (WASH).","Technologies":"Wastewater monitoring systems, pathogen tracking technology.","People":"Public health authorities, wastewater management organizations.","Owner":"Public health authorities, wastewater management organizations."}]}
